member.name: M:Compentio.Ankara.Controllers.AuthorizationController.Logon
member.summary: Method provides logon for user that is in Active directory. It check for active user with AD user name in database

member.name: M:Compentio.Ankara.Controllers.UsersController.GetUsers(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int64},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Method returns Users from Database for list of departments. Example: /api/users?departmentIds=1,2,3.
member.param: Id fof department for which to search users
For True method returns only active users

member.summary: Modifies user data in the application
